Dear Radiance aficionados,


The 2006 Radiance Workshop will be held at De Montfort University  
(Leicester, UK) sometime in September.


The Workshop will last two days and follow the same format as  
previous events.  We will try to keep prices much the same as before  
(i.e. in the region of US$200-250 for the registration, less for  
speakers).


To allow for some flexibility in planning, I have provisionally  
booked a room during both the first and third (full) weeks in  
September [1].  I will need to finalise the booking in the next week  
or two.  Please respond as soon as possible giving your preference.


Option A:   7-8 September (Thu-Fri)
Option B: 18-19 September (Mon-Tue)


It would greatly assist the organisers if firm bookings could be made  
sooner rather than later.  I will send more details once we have  
settled on a preferred date.  The tally stands at 1 for Option B (my  
preferred date).


I look forward to hearing from you -- soon.


-John


[1] Greg asked that I avoid the second week, so please don't ask for  
that.


PS.  The Queens Building is a (rather famous) low energy building  
with natural ventilation and copious daylight (weather permitting).
